scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:postcss
scripts.dev: parallelshell "npm run browsersync" " node-sass _System/assets/sass/** -o _System/public/stylesheets --source-map true --watch" " postcss --use autoprefixer -o _System/public/stylesheets/application.css _System/public/stylesheets/application.css " " node-sass _System/assets/sass/booking-system.scss -o _System/public/stylesheets --source-map true --watch" " watchify _System/assets/javascript/application.js -o _System/public/javascript/application.js --debug --verbose "
